    • Uses of GameObject in entity

      Subclasses of GameObject in entity

      class  Ray
      Ray object class used for draw lines for deciding enemy movement

      Methods in entity with parameters of type GameObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Projectile.bounce(GameObject o, int width)
      Method bounces projectile motion by reversing its speed vectors depending on which direction it collides pre: o.collides(this) post: speedX or speedY changed
      boolean Tank.checkCollision(GameObject o, int damage)
      Method checks if the tank has hit a game object pre: o != null post: tank health reduced and true returned if tank is hit, else false

    • Uses of GameObject in templates

      Methods in templates with parameters of type GameObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Game.add(GameObject o)
      Adds a game object to the screen Any added objects will have their act method called every millisecond
      boolean GameObject.collides(GameObject o)
      Returns true if this object collides with another GameObject
      void Game.remove(GameObject o)
      Removes a game object from the screen
